page.title: 09Rotary's Charity Work Darwen
page.content: Much of their work is raising money for{educational use,initiative awards, {Braille sets}for overseas and{aiding {local charities.}No special appeal is being made at present. In the last 2 years,58{Emergency {Boxes}have been provided -{8 cu.ft. capacity, containing essential items for{disaster relief - clothes,cooking {utensils,blankets,plastic sheet,tools and other small items;aim is to {shelter,feed,clothe;}stored centrally for easy distribution by other charities. Money raised by{sponsored walks,flea {markets,raffles,local schools etc. Other aid to community includes such things as{mock interviews}for{school {leavers}where members use their knowledge of trades or professions to guide youngsters. Members meet for lunch every week.
